response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to you. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, this is an investment that could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. I am offering you the chance to secure this remarkable asset at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of working with you on this exciting acquisition.", "product_price": 1100000}
